VALID_AUTHOR_REGEX - Static variable in interface oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata.SharedMetadata
Author name declared as '!Author: Author name goes here' Must start with a letter, and must end in a letter (uppercase or lowercase) May have any number of letters (any case), full stops (for initials), commas (for multiple authors), and spaces
